section.title: DestroyStyle
section.para:
deletes the style named style. The changes take effect immediately. Note that style is not a wild-carded search string, but rather a case-sensitive string that should exactly match the original
command.
Destroying style "*" can be done, but isn't really to be recommended. For example:
This removes all settings for the style named "Application*", NOT all styles starting with "Application".
